mvAE9HjwMKFYi4aXR.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

m3w3BEi5Q78ms1DY8.name: Tough Skin
m3w3BEi5Q78ms1DY8.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

m-aPxGZMr3yOPco5O.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m9NxWTmBaP1uGfSud.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mjJEUYQr1m6_utMp-.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

moaS90LRM5m2Glx-x.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tQtQzL7Rk9s0OvB2G.name: Indomitable
tQtQzL7Rk9s0OvB2G.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

tu_oVfX8AsW3e7gnA.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

m3fhib6T2C_r13grG.name: Diffuse
m3fhib6T2C_r13grG.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mgHWTudC0rXcnophj.name: Homogenous
mgHWTudC0rXcnophj.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mhMDomUnppMCg8B_p.name: No Blood
mhMDomUnppMCg8B_p.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mNlMY4B2uj1eMIktS.name: No Brain
mNlMY4B2uj1eMIktS.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mFlGkUmRq9ndVv4v6.name: No Eyes
mFlGkUmRq9ndVv4v6.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

m9Nk73iFv_rvoILob.name: No Head
m9Nk73iFv_rvoILob.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mPkpFKROWTN7z-5Vv.name: No Neck
mPkpFKROWTN7z-5Vv.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

m3ganj0eYfJvTsmMV.name: No Vitals
m3ganj0eYfJvTsmMV.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mKMl2LSw6fLd4W0o2.name: Unliving
mKMl2LSw6fLd4W0o2.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

tNFoY6zqWXC97Oz1m.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

mqNzySt7MfLRPca15.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

mpa2qURu57uO_Cxh8.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

mzh2aZr5m3c3Fwlxj.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

tzfx4vQozlCbO12FY.name: Single-Minded
tzfx4vQozlCbO12FY.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

t2q6sLVK5QhtNH6Kr.name: Unfazeable
t2q6sLVK5QhtNH6Kr.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

tzEFTvGQrQNHAz299.name: Hidebound
tzEFTvGQrQNHAz299.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

t97Jx-oE6z88gNwf8.name: Incurious
t97Jx-oE6z88gNwf8.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tZXo990csNEnTh2zu.name: Bad Grip
tZXo990csNEnTh2zu.notes: -2/level to tasks that require a firm grip (max 3 levels)
